title: Is the Placebo Effect a Miracle?
description:
In a three way conversation John Vervaeke asked me if I'd consider the placebo effect a miracle. I had to think about it quickly and I responded yes. Upon further reflection I think that was a good answer. Here's why. 

Original Conversation https://youtu.be/GCeHJtdQ0fg

JP Marceau wrote a paper on the intersection of CS Lewis's book Miracles and John Vervaeke's non-reductive physicalism which he posted on the Symbolic World. Because Lewis' book has been important in my life we got together to talk about it. 

https://thesymbolicworld.com/articles/investigating-miracles-with-lewis-and-vervaeke/
CS Lewis Miracles https://amzn.to/2TXCoyn
JP Marceau and Jonathan Pageau discuss it https://youtu.be/Su_ggDVzKLw
JP Marceau and John Vervaeke discuss it the first time https://youtu.be/-VBl9Jv8eR0
Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU 

Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/
